penalties.title: The only son challenge
penalties.description: All only sons have to drink from the beverage of the one on their right side

penalties.title: The A for the E
penalties.description: The one on your left says a statement, which you have to repeat replacing all As for Es

penalties.title: The last clap
penalties.description: The one that claps at last have to drink

penalties.title: Ban a word
penalties.description: Choose a word to be banned, if one says it, then one has to drink

penalties.title: Shame on you
penalties.description: Pick up two people, which have to drink

penalties.title: There's a whole in my cup
penalties.description: You have to drink half of the cup

penalties.title: Swinger on dutty
penalties.description: Exchange cups with the one on your left
